import React from 'react'; class SignUpUser extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ name :"", email:"", mobile:"", password:"", Gender:"", DateOfBirth:"" } } RadioChange = (e)=>{ this.setState({Gender:e.target.value}) } render(){ console.log(this.state.Gender) return(
